item.title: Tip: Use the same Import Order in IntelliJ IDEA as Eclipse's
item.description: Organize IntelliJ IDEA’s import as Eclipse ones: While working at a client, where everyone is using eclipse, while I’m using IntelliJ IDEA, there are subtle formatting differences. One of them is in the order of the imports. To solve it, see this link
